resources.string: INSTIREPO\n\nInstrepo is a platform where students and teachers can interact and share anything related to their educational institute and can also purchase and sell products on the platform which are uploaded by other students and teachers from their institute and verified by our team.

Credits : 

Icons and images :

Icons and images used in this application have been taken from www.freepik.com.
Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com

1. Danger icon : ic_danger_exclaimation
Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
2. Double Tick : ic_double_tick
Icon made by Google from www.flaticon.com
3. Tick : ic_tick_small_green
Icon made by Google from www.flaticon.com
4. All other images also are from www.flaticon.com
5. If any credit is missing, you can contact us and we will add the credits here.

Open source libraries used :

1. Crashlytics
2. Android Design Support Library
3. Google Play Services library
4. Android Support-v7 AppCompat Library 
5. NineOldAndroids
6. Android Support Pallete Library
7. Dropbox Android SDK
8. GSON
9. JSON Simple
10. Universal Image Loader
11. Volley by Google
12. Parallax EveryWhere By Narfss
13. If any library is missing, you can contact us and we will add the credits here.
